title: C++ Level 1 â€” Basics & Input/Output
intro: This level introduces the basic structure of a C++ program and simple input/output using cout and cin.
points: Understand the structure of a C++ program with headers and the main() function.
Use cout to print text and values to the console.
Use cin to read integers and other basic data types.
Get comfortable compiling and running simple C++ programs.
Understand the difference between statements and expressions.
